mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material_group_dtl (group_id, material_id, comment, creator, create_time) VALUES(#{groupId}, #{materialId}, #{comment}, #{creator}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM material_group_dtl WHERE group_id = #{groupId} and material_id = #{materialId}
mapper.select: select w.uid, w.content, w.comment, w.creator, w.create_time, w.update_time from material w, material_group_dtl wrd where w.uid = wrd.material_id and wrd.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER by case when w.update_time is null then w.create_time else w.update_time end desc
